plugin.name: Calcium Noise Analysis
plugin.author: George
plugin.description: Comprehensive calcium imaging analysis toolkit with 16+ modules for noise analysis, event detection, spatial analysis, wave propagation, oscillations, and quality control.
plugin.long_description:
Calcium Noise Analysis v2.0 provides production-quality tools for comprehensive calcium imaging data analysis. Features include:
CORE MODULES: Power spectral density analysis, SD fluctuation processing, shot noise characterization, baseline estimation, dF/F calculation, event detection, correlation analysis, and noise metrics.
ADVANCED MODULES: Power spectrum maps (PSM/η), correlation maps (CRM/ξ), advanced cross-correlation, ring correlation, spatial extent analysis, flux analysis, clearance rate estimation, punctate vs diffuse separation, Lorentzian/exponential fitting.
SPATIAL ANALYSIS: Automated activity detection from PSM/CRM, spatial clustering, Ripley's K function, density mapping, nearest-neighbor analysis.
TEMPORAL ANALYSIS: Lock & Parker SD stack generation, event kinetics (rise time, decay tau, FWHM), oscillation detection, frequency analysis, phase coherence, regularity metrics.
WAVE PROPAGATION: Initiation site detection, velocity measurement, directional analysis, spatiotemporal maps (kymographs), wave collision detection.
QUALITY CONTROL: Comprehensive SNR assessment, photobleaching detection, motion artifact identification, CASCADE noise metric (ν), automated quality reporting.
BATCH COMPARISON: Statistical comparisons (t-test, ANOVA, Mann-Whitney, Kruskal-Wallis), dose-response curves, effect sizes, publication-ready reports.
Based on research from CASCADE, Swaminathan et al. 2020, Lock & Parker 2020 (FLIKA), and Suite2p methodologies. Optimized for TIRF microscopy and calcium imaging workflows.
